Robert McRae
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Office Of The Mayor: Read This Section First!: Privacy Policy Read If You Are Under 13, Or A Parent!: Completed Consent Forms: Robert McRae
By Lisa Shock on Monday, June 19, 2000 - 06:57 pm:

By my signature below, I give my consent for my child, Robert McRae, to post at
your site, Monster Rancher Metropolis. I understand that my child may choose to
post an e-mail address as part of his/her personal registration at the site and that
email address will be publicly visible. However, I also understand that the e-mail
address, the screen name, and anything my child posts will only be used for
internal website purposes and will not be sold or otherwise provided to any other
business or entity.

By my signature below, I acknowledge having reviewed your site, and approve it as
a place my child may visit. I understand that both adults and children post at this
site, and that it is not a "children's only" site. I understand that video and
computer games are discussed freely on the site, and I take the responsibility for
reviewing for myself the nature of all such games, and whether each particular
game is suitable for my child. I also acknowledge and understand that the game
manufacturers and designers are responsible for the contents of the games
discussed at the site.

By my signature below, I acknowledge that the chat room which is part of this site
is off limits for my child.

I understand that a copy of this form with my electronic signature will be posted
on the site. I understand that I can revoke or amend my consent at any time by
posting the revocation or amendment in the assigned message area under the
consent form on the website.

I understand that my child will not be permitted to participate in the site until a
mailed copy of the consent form with a signature of a parent or guardian is
received by the administrator of the site at the following address:
Monster Rancher Metropolis
4757 E. Greenway Road #103-106
Phoenix, AZ 85032-8510

Ellen McRae
_________________________
Signature of Parent or Guardian

Ellen McRae
__________________________
Printed Name of Parent or Guardian

June 15, 2000
